author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR modernizes ESProducers in JetMETCorrections/Modules (as part of #26748) by
* Fixing a memory leak in `JetCorrectionESSource`
* Using ESGetToken
* Merging header and source for QGLikelihoodESProducer, QGLikelihoodSystematicsESProducer, and JetCorrectionESChain, and moving them to `plugins`
* Avoiding a copy of the product in QGLikelihoodESProducer and QGLikelihoodSystematicsESProducer
* Using `make_unique`, and removing unnecessary call to `ChainedJetCorrector::clear()` in JetCorrectionESChain

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.
title: Modernize ESProducers in JetMETCorrections/Modules
